ai-mil3.5.3:1.2_0: “Venerable Sir, it is possible to know this.”
ai-mil3.5.3:1.4_0: “Sir, how is it possible to know this?”
ai-mil3.5.3:1.5_0: “Once upon a time, great king, there was a senior monk called Tissa, who was a customs stationed up in the realm of the Thirty-Three.”
ai-mil3.5.3:1.7_0: “In the same way, great king, someone who sees the teaching sees the Buddha.”
ai-mil3.5.3:3.1_0: In the supreme Buddhahood of the supreme Buddha,
